message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a price of $14000. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, $12500 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13500. What do you think?
Alice, I understand your position, but $13500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $13000. This would be a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident we can close this deal.

I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! However, $13000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $13500. This is my final offer, but I think it's a great deal for both of us.
